name: Kevin's dreams
description:
Kevis is a little boy.

And like all little boys, Kevin has MONSTERS INVADING HIS ROOM WHEN HE'S SLEEPING!

You have to help him clean his room as quickly as possible, killing as many monsters as possible !

To help you in this task, Kevin got his magick wood sword and his magic towers.  When the three towers are materialized in the room, it make Kevin invincible ! 

Put it on the floor to force monsters to attack it but be careful ! If a tower is destroyed, kevin become vulnerable and monsters attack him again !

Catch the magik ball 
to have the opportunity to put a new tower.

Save kevin's dreams !!

-----

Controls :

Hold E : Prepare Magick Tower

Release E : Put Magick Tower in room

Space : Attack Enemy

WASD : Move
